document_data.name: Aloeswood
document_data.mainbody: '''Aloeswood''' was a wood valued for its pleasant smell.
document_data.Availability:
[[Aurora's Emporium]] sold aloeswood chips for 1 [[gp]] per {{SI|6|oz}}, intended for use by [[priest]]s as an aromatic ritual reagent.

Aloeswood was a regular trade good on the caravans that crossed the [[Taan]] region between [[Faer√ªn]] and [[Kara-Tur]].
